abstract: Maria Seragou, a broker at Phoenix Partners Group, has a side career as a ballroom dancer and daydreams of dance steps at her Bloomberg terminal.
snippet: Maria Seragou, a broker at Phoenix Partners Group, has a side career as a ballroom dancer and daydreams of dance steps at her Bloomberg terminal.
lead_paragraph: Maria Seragou, a credit broker at Phoenix Partners Group, spends hours every day analyzing figures, firming up her positions, and trying to avoid tripping up her partners.

headline.main: Dreaming About Dancing the Cha-Cha on the Trading Floor
